column1: '''Saint Brendan''' was an Irish monk who made a legendary journey to the western sea and found utopian lands. [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] was aware of this legend and made references to it.
The concept of [[Aman]] as the Paradise in the West
column3: are inspired from the tale of St. Brendan. Tolkien even wrote a poem ''[[Imram]]'' about him.

column1: Brendan's voyage is referenced again in ''[[The Notion Club Papers]]'' as well as the search for the West.
